fields.title: S8 Launch Identity
fields.subtitle: Samsung
fields.description: In April 2017, Samsung released its latest novel smartphone, the Galaxy S8. R/GA was tasked to develop a campaign launch of universality and sophistication for the American market and to align with Samsung’s global strategy. Design direction and prototypes of generative expressions were developed to direct and inspire the Galaxy S8 campaign launch commercials.

fields.title: Results
fields.description: 4 global TV commercials inspired by the generative expressions

fields.title: Zig - app for lifestyle & mobility
fields.subtitle: ComfortDelGro
fields.description:
Zig is a mobile lifestyle platform that innovatively combines journey planning, transport booking, and lifestyle discovery into an all-in-one mobile app built for the global land transport giant ComfortDelGro.

Leveraging multidisciplinary consulting design and technology teams from R/GA, Zig is crafted from the ground up using modern technology, design, and branding, creating unique value for users and becoming Singapore’s first-ever mobility lifestyle platform.

fields.title: Hū: The Spectrum of Being
fields.subtitle: Samsung
fields.description: In September 2016, Samsung approached R/GA to build an immersive installation at the 837 flagship space in New York City. Carlos Serrao, R/GA and Samsung combined their expertise in digital ingenuity, photography and technology to present the public with an interactive portrait creation experience that uniquely captures the individual.

fields.title: ClouD
fields.subtitle: Interactive Installation
fields.description: “ClouD” is an interactive installation that was built in response to the growing concern of air quality in China resulted from the country’s urban and industrial development.

fields.description: Public Transportation + Taxi Booking + Restaurants + Deals + Takeaway

fields.title: Block Party
fields.subtitle: Plug & Play
fields.description: Block Party is an immersive and interactive experience that explores the powerful relationship between humans and our environment. Through the playful and accessible medium of dance, visitors can participate in collaborative placemaking and engage with iconic buildings like never before. The installation has shown in multiple festivals and exhibitions in Singapore, Thailand, and China.

fields.title: R/GA Academy
fields.subtitle: R/GA
fields.description: In August 2017, R/GA released its first artificial intelligence based generative expression for Academy, its newly minted apprenticeship program in New York. The expression was developed to reflect the personality of every apprentice, all held within an ‘A’ structure, representing both Academy and the apprentices.

fields.title: S8 Unbox - An Interactive Website
fields.subtitle: Samsung
fields.description: For Samsung Galaxy S8 smartphone, R/GA was tasked to launch a mobile site where users can touch and interact with the phone and explore main features. We leveraged various sensors and triggers on smartphones (such as accelerometer, gyroscope, vibration motor) and delivered a full-3D immersive experience to users.

fields.title: Beyond Time
fields.subtitle: Client - Shiseido
fields.description: "Beyond Time" is an interactive exhibit at Shiseido's Global Innovation Center that offers visitors a unique time travel experience. The installation allows pairs of individuals to view each other at different stages of their lives with the use of digital aging technology on their faces, encouraging them to explore the concept of beauty in aging, both physically and mentally.

fields.title: Equilibrium
fields.subtitle: Personal Project
fields.description: Equilibrium is a collaborative digital game, designed and developed for the physical computing program held at ITP, Tisch School of the Arts in New York University. It is a digital game that combines emotive interactions, game mechanics, industrial design and a refined aesthetic culminating in hardware and software.

fields.title: m o o d
fields.subtitle: Interactive Music Player
fields.description: 'm o o d' is an interactive music player product that offers simple and intuitive music control through a tactile user interface, as opposed to a screen-based touch UX design. I collaborated with a designer and a musician to create this innovative product prototype. It has been featured in multiple exhibitions, including New York Maker Faire and The NYC Arcade.

fields.title: Story from the Heart
fields.subtitle: Interactive Cinema
fields.description: "Story from the Heart" is an interactive cinematic experience I developed in Second Story to explore the possibility of combining heart rate data with entertainment. Using XBee and 3D printing, a ball-shaped wireless heart rate monitor constantly sends real-time data to computers. With the video player I built with Chrome extension, the audience can actively affect the combination of movie clips by changing their heart rate. The higher their heart rate is, the more intense the spot will be.

fields.title: Privacy Policy URL
fields.subtitle: App Store / 1000 Hours
fields.description:
Jedy Chen built the 1000hours app as a Free app.

This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.
If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at 1000hours unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

fields.title: Public Performance at Light Canvas
fields.subtitle: i Light Singapore Festival
fields.description: The Light Canvas installation at the i Light Singapore Festival 2022 invited me to participate with a performance. The installation empowers the audience to turn their movements into illuminations, and I designed and executed a light painting performance to showcase its capabilities.

fields.title: 1000 Hours
fields.subtitle: A self-made app
fields.description: 1000 Hours is a minimalist habit tracking application created through the combination of my personal skills and tools, including Figma and Flutter. The development process brought together expertise in UI/UX design, design language systems, and app development to create the final product, which was released on major platforms, including the Apple App Store, Android Play Store, and Huawei App Gallery.
